verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah (7x) - Praise the Lord!
Men and angels bow down before Him
Hosts of heaven all adore Him
World and the universe kept by His power
All join together to praise the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come and adore, worship before Him
Flesh clothed in Spirit showing His name
Redeemed and blood bought filled with His glory
Praising forever, priests of our God.
